thread.title: 'Drunk' Charlie Sheen thrown off bar in headlock
thread.title_full: 'Drunk' Charlie Sheen thrown off bar in headlock - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: 'Drunk' Charlie Sheen thrown off bar in headlock
text:
Charlie Sheen's late stay at the bar took a wrong turn when he was pushed out of the premises by bouncers in a headlock.
READ: Jon Cryer opens up about Charlie Sheen in 'So That Happened'
According to sources, the 50-year-old actor was friendly with his fans and was clicking pictures with them, but when a woman tried to shoot video of him on her cellphone, he slapped the phone out of her hands, reports TMZ.com.
The Platoon star was then taken out by the bouncer, but he did not increase the drama instead he shook hands with them and went off with his driver.
